events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like a full refund for it as soon as possible.
The customer's request for a full refund due to incorrect item delivery has been noted and categorized as a refund issue.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the incorrect item. I’ll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 45321789 and I have attached the photo showing the wrong product I received instead of the headphones I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and the easy refund process you are offering.
The refund has been processed and should be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund correctly. Please let us know if everything is settled to your satisfaction.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support and refund process. Your feedback is appreciated.
